name: Krimanshi Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description: Krimanshi exists in the intersection of three societal problems i) Poor quality and unsustainable manufacturing of animal feeds, ii) Production of low quality animal proteins for consumer consumption and iii) Large volumes of processed and unprocessed food and agri waste. Krimanshi is bringing circular economy practices and tech-enabled sourcing and high-quality proprietary processing innovations to increase the quality of cow feeds from agri residues and waste. Krimanshi uses proprietary processing and innovation for increasing the digestibility and absorption of feed ingredients in animals and helping them derive the maximum benefits from the feed. The benefits have not only been in the quality and quantity of milk production but also in the increased quality of life for bovines with following major impacts: 20% increase in milk production 20% increase in milk fat% and/ or SNF% (Solids-not-fat) 50% reduction in spending on veterinary costs over time Krimanshi has sold over 6,000 tonnes of dairy feed to 10,000+ farmers. With better understanding of ingredients, it has already started insect protein and fat production and is now working to launch poultry and aqua feeds by rearing and processing waste through soldier fly larvae. Krimanshi is led by a core team of biotechnologists, doctorates in chemistry and breeding and MBAs with a combined experience of over 75+years in food research and production, dairy, FMCG and consulting. Krimanshi is backed by CIIE-IIM A, RVCF, Social Alpha and Villgro.

Its product Green Aero capitalizes on untapped energy by reducing drag experienced by the vehicle due to air resistance. The product is designed to reduce the resistance by drag force thereby the energy is conserved, amplified and then converted to electric energy. This energy is used to recharge the battery on the go thereby adding to the vehicles running range. Thus, faster the vehicle, more the number miles added. So far, the test results have shown that an impressive enhancement of up to 60% in vehicle range(at an average speed of 50 mph for an hour with a standard battery size of 60kWh). This also means that the average charging time per miles is getting reduced. This perspective holds importance as an EV in general takes longer time to charge compared to a combustion engine vehicle getting re- fueled. Startup India recognized company (Certificate No.: DIPP6572)

name: Bewust Foods
description: Indian biscuits market values approx. 5 billion USD, we are the largest consumer of biscuits in the world. But 99.99% of our bakery is made from ultra-processed white flour aka Maida, transfats, and numerous chemicals which reportedly cause various lifestyle diseases. Just so you know, every 12th Indian is a diabetic, and more than 2.7 million Indians die of heart diseases every year – 52 percent of them below the age of 70. As a typical chai-biscuit lover, we wanted to rehabilitate Indian bakery vis a vis reducing the disease burden using our technical know-how of nutrition science, food technology, and traditional wisdom. Ancient grains aka Millets came across as the best bet as they contain 2x more Protein, 5x more Fibre, and 8x more Calcium than wheat. Millets reportedly reduce 30% risk of Cancers, 20% risk of heart disease & 19% risk of blood sugar. Millets are also incredibly environment friendly, take 80% less water than wheat & require no chemical other input to grow. Therefore, we founded Bazic in 2019 to build a 'crop to cookie' model, connecting agri-scientists, marginal farmers, and food scientists to develop delicious comfort foods like Bajra brownies, bajra choco chip cookies, jowar nankhatai etc.

The harsh reality is that during the period of boom , grain merchants either do not provide or try to hide the information of prices to prevent their own loss resulting in loss of their income. Dainik Bhav thus aims at providing these information along with some more detailed analysis through Text Messages in Hindi Language which can be easily comprehended by farmers.

name: Unyoung India Pvt. Ltd.
description: The world is aging and growing older. It is also doing so at a brisk pace. Closer home in India, the population of 60 years and above is expected to soon constitute around 20% of the total population. In 2021, the 60 Plus Population is estimated to be 138 Millon. On aggregate, the elderly population is projected to have risen by 32.7% between 2011 to 2021, even as the the general population has risen by 12.4% during the same period. With better facilities and a rationalization of prices, a trend of “voluntary retirement” at around age 50 is also catching up nowadays. This population clubbed with the Senior Citizen population based on the traditional age criteria forms a significant chunk of consumers. In terms of purchasing power this translates into an opportunity of USD 12 Billion or INR 84 Lakh Crore. However, products and services designed and targeting this segment are few and far between. Majority of Service Providers are focused on Health Care and Nursing Care for this segment which constitutes roughly 10% - 15% of the total segment at best. Apart from products and services, ageing, in its wake brings its own peculiar challenges. These range from isolation resulting from changing family structures to lack of connect with same age group and many more social issues. NjoyUrAge is looking to provide comprehensive solution to address these challenges. NjoyUrAge is a web and app platform positioned to be the Go-To solution for the 50 Plus population and resolve the segments needs for engagement, leisure and learning. We are intent to radically transform the market by providing services and products designed specifically for senior citizens. We intend to do so by creating the largest community of Older Adults through constant engagement and activity. Leveraging mobile and web apps we are creating the largest community of Older Adults. Some of the features of these are: 1. Connect: Intended to enable seniors to connect & engage online. The users can create polls, hold forum discussions, share anecdotes & have one to one chat with other users registered on the platform. 2. Community Connect: This provides for creation of localized communities of Seniors who share a common interest such as a hobby or an activity. It also enables the seniors to give back to the society by connecting them to NGO’s or by enabling their participation in socially relevant activities such as a cleanliness drive or a plantation drive. 3. Events: Intended to foster social mingling – online and offline - amongst the seniors by organizing & hosting curated & specialized events for the Seniors. These may be Theatre Shows, Yoga Seminars or a community specific event. 4. Health & Fitness: The dedicated section on Health & Fitness contains curated videos & articles on ‘Positivity’, ‘Spirituality’ as well as relevant information on common health issues afflicting the age group. Also connects to Service Providers rendering services such as Yoga, Physiotherapy & Physical Training. 5. Xplore: Xplore is dedicated to activities & travel. This contains information on Travel such as Destinations, Experiential Travel as well as enables booking of Travel & Tour Packages. The section also has information on Nutrition such as Recipes for the Age Group. 6. Services: Registered users may use this to book service provided by a curated set of Service Providers. The services rendered are designed basis the needs and requirements of the seniors. Services which shall be provided include Optician at Home,Hobby Classes & Home Refurbishing. The target users are at the centre of work done at NjoyUrAge. Our platforms are tailored to suit the requirements of this segment. 1. The entire setup & structure of NjoyUrAge is tailored & curated for the particular age segment. Content is specifically designed for the target segment. 2. Events/ Activities & tour packages shall be designed keeping in mind the constraints & special requirements of the Seniors. 3. Services which are being developed are designed to be of use of the particular-age segment. 4. The focus of the entire setup is on infusing positivity to the process of aging. 5. An engagement & constructive occupation of the seniors that will bring a change in the daily lives of seniors. The concept of NjoyUrAge revolves around socialization with emphasis on engagement and connection. An approach that largely dwells into the software piece of aging than the hardware bit, makes the entire community of elders think through ageing and its challenges, differently. An orientation to create an user-friendly eco-system for the ageing community --- build around their aspirations rather than the generic support/helping orientation for ageing Most of the service providers in this domain are largely focussed on supplying supporting hardware in a E-market place environment for elderlies, and do not dwell into the critical aspects of engagement & occupation and building a community --- which is the core focus of NjoyUrAge NjoyUrAge can alter the way aging is looked at in India & the rest of the world. Independence, confidence, and agility brought to the lives of elderlies.

name: Nimitta Digital Solutions Private Limited
description: BulknMore is India’s only 100% Swadeshi B2B E-Commerce platform. BulknMore connects manufacturers (MSMEs) across India with retailers across India on an app and web based platform, making goods manufactured anywhere in India available to retailers anywhere in India. The B2B bulk market in India is currently estimated to be $350 Billion in size, most of which is unorganized. B2B trade is currently plagued by numerous inefficiencies, right from the presence of numerous middlemen to unavailability of credit for many retailers. In addition to this, the Indian market is flooded with foreign, especially Chinese goods, which pose a threat to India’s indigenous industries. BulknMore is a company that aims to solve these problems for B2B trade in India – by seamlessly connecting retailers to manufacturers on a common platform, by providing credit to retailers, enabling them to grow quickly, and providing quality checked goods at the cheapest prices, resulting in a win-win for all.

name: Zoi
description: Our company plans to provide an end to end solution to safety aspects of connected mobility and commercialize on the increasing inclination of Indian population towards road safety. Around 1.5 lakh people lose their lives in road accidents and costs around 4.34 lakh crore to the Indian economy. What's intriguing is that 50% of these lives can be saved if timely medical services can be provided within the golden hour of the accident. We are patient people trying to solve the road accident fatality problem with the help of technology. name: Mr Repair
description: Mr Repair, a one-stop destination for local services, commenced its operations in 2015 as a service provider for the corporate sector as well as a residential property maintenance services firm in Jaipur. Jaipur being a tier II city has a fair number of corporates as well as middle-class households as a potential customer base. Corporates encounter challenges of unregistered vendors, lack of paperwork, and customer support (during or post-service) for residential clients. “We see a huge requirement for annual maintenance contracts/ subscription models in technical maintenance services for corporate clients with multiple city location offices. These corporates present an immense opportunity to expand geographically and provide a recurring stream of income. If tapped properly, one can acquire new projects and build a loyal customer base as an add-on business. Technical service base business has certainly a huge market,” explicates Anirudh. From where it all Started Just after completion of B.Tech – Electrical, Anirudh and Bharat got placed in MNCs. Thereafter, they began looking for commercializing their technical skills for creating value. They decided to come up with an engineering firm to set a roadmap for those graduating with a technical background and have some business acumen or want to get self-employed. “Bharat is well versed in computers & IT and branding while Anirudh handles administration and sales. We complement each other’s attributes, which is a demand for a multifaceted business like us. Choosing a non-competitive business model with respect to those MNCs in which we use to work was also an advantage as we were not conditioned and started everything from nothing,” mentions Anirudh. "We believe building a brand doesn’t take million it takes imagination and lifetime dedication" At the start, it was difficult to connect with technicians and modulate their way of working; eventually, an in-house team of 20+ technicians and 70+ associates (off role) technical staff were formed. “For managing this team and database of 40-50 leads on a daily basis, we have developed customized ERP software which has evolved after several trial and errors. Now, we are planning to license out this valuable process in a franchise format,”. Apart from these backend developments, the company has managed to accomplish large-scale projects with Shobha Ltd., Amazon, Uber India system, Dunes Harley, Larsen & Toubro, Godrej, and a few govt. tech-based projects. It has served 10,000+ customers and 70-80 Subscription contracts in different A-List companies too. The company operates in four kinds of formats simultaneously – retail business leads which include quick maintenance services such as a plumber, electrician carpenters, air conditioner and electronics repair, pest control, water proofing and fabrication work; recurring nature of contracts like AMC, installation of products; large scales volume projects such as renovation, revamp, complete structural civil work, and consumable inventory items for industries and offices such as fire extinguishers, biometric, CCTV, and its accessories, different dispensers and furnishing items such as blinds, industrial curtains, amongst others. "Bharat Sharma Co-Founder" & "Anirudh Sharma Co-Founder" Stepping Forward into Growth Mr. Repair has been growing organically for the past five years; it has crossed revenue of 3 cr in the last financial year. It was awarded as " TOP 10 STARTUP IN JAIPUR " in 2019 by silicon India Magazine and was featured in your story. With registered vendors for big corporates like JLL, L&T, Amazon, Uber India, and chains of clinics and restaurants in 10+ cities of India including Indore, Bhopal, Lucknow, Delhi, and Chandigarh. The team is currently building an eminent online presence and is all set for the franchise model. “The goal is to distribute franchisees across 100 cities in the next three years through hub and spokes model each having standardized process, revenue stream, backend tech support, and centralized marketing campaigns. “We are also forming a routine auditing mechanism for governing such large operations and cash flow. We would start accepting the application for the same by June of next year,” Started with an entrepreneurial spirit and dedication to solve the problem in one of the most unorganized sectors with minimal Investments, It has been growing organically and profitably since its first year. The company has created direct and indirect jobs for more than 500+ people and has a rich customer base in both B2C and B2B space.

name: Kureins.Com
description: What is kuriens.com? At kuriens we are working towards a business model which will help the society by providing them the best and quick medical and healthcare help. We’ll try our best to provide the desirable services to the customer satisfaction. As we are not even in the market but still if gets that opportunity then we will rock the market with the talent we got. What will we provide? We will provide the services like gym membership, spa and saloon booking at visit or home, medical consultancy, prescribed medicines, healthcare and beauty products, home care(nurses at home, mother and baby care) packages, healthcare insurance and else we can add some more in future as need increase. Visit www.kuriens.com How we will do this? We will at first contact the local dealers to supply for us by reaching out to the company too for the exclusive products and direct buying. And for services we contact the service providers at first to deliver services for us and then soon as we grow we will insure that those services will also be available by our name too. What about the revenue? It’s completely a commission based business model at start stage. A commission ranging from 10-20% will be charged by the service and product suppliers. Once we have our own services we can have better revenue options. As we do not need to buy services from outsiders and products bought from dealers tough we can buy them directly from the company and storing them is warehouses. Company’s growth and future aspects. Stay true to the core purpose when scaling our business, never take our eye off of what got us there in the first place. Stay true to our vision, and make sure everyone else does too. The decisions we make during this time of rapid market growth we need to connect back to why we started our company. Develop a new mission although we're sticking to a core purpose, we'll need to chart a very clear course for the future. Map out our goals and assign a timeline, so we know exactly what we need to achieve after one quarter, one year and so on. By asking every team member to work toward very specific milestones, we are able to grow in an intentional way. When creating a mission for our company, we make sure mission goals are measurable so we know which activities and initiatives will deliver the desired results. Be very picky with new opportunities as our company's stature grows, expect a slew of opportunities at our doorstep. Most of them won't be worth it. This is the time to stay focused on our customers and wow them at every opportunity. It can be easy to get distracted from our customers with all these new opportunities coming our way, but we remember, if we don't have customers, we don't have a business. Spending time and energy on opportunities that don't align with our customers' needs is just a distraction. Focus on cash in the door as our company grows quickly; invest in sales and marketing strategies that will continue to pay off over time. Seek out partnerships and systems that will produce for years to come, not just one-off deals for the sake of a quick buck. Get our priorities straight during a period of rapid growth; we know how important it is to stay true to the company's vision. But it's more complicated than that. Founders and CEOs need to have an ability to step back and get the overall lay of the land. Things can change rapidly, and it's very important to evaluate whether the way we spend our time is aligned with our ultimate purpose. Do the goals we originally outlined still serve our company, and are we and our team spending time and resources on the things that will enable us to achieve our goals? Get everyone behind our vision by reach out to our staff, partners and customers, and invite them to share in our vision. People love to play on the winning team, and if our company is taking off, use the positive momentum to our advantage. It's an invigorating experience and so many people walk away with a desire to be part of our company's success. Hire, train (and fire) to our vision by understanding that every person we hire will either strengthen or weaken our culture. That's a tough lesson to learn, but deep down we all know it's true. Consider applicants in terms of their personality and fit, and train them through an on boarding experience that reflects our culture. Look for contributors who are motivated both by the company purpose and a genuine enjoyment of what they do. On the flip side, we can't be afraid to fire people based on patterns of violating our company's values or poor performance. As difficult as it may seem at the time, there's no doubt our company will be better for it in the long run. Guiding a company through a period of rapid growth comes with a slew of challenges. In time, we won't be worried about growing a startup--we'll be running a large company. And that’s for sure.

name: ANGIRUS IND PRIVATE LIMITED
description: Angirus (Previously known as SLICK) is an innovative circular economy startup that makes High-quality, dampproof and lightweight bricks named Wricks, It aims to reduce the brick work cost up to 20%. Today, the clay brick industry consumes 350 million tons of fertile soil and 25 million metric tons of coal, releases toxic gases and making it highly unsustainable industry. Even the central pollution control board is planning to shut down these brick kilns. To address the issue with value chain of brick industry, We are developing eco-friendly, lightweight and dampproof bricks, as an alternative for unsustainable clay bricks industry. Wricks weighs 1Kg lesser and has the compressive strength equivalent to Class-A clay bricks. It is being tested with govt. accredited NABL (National accreditation board for testing and calibration laboratory) laboratory on the Indian standard {IS 3495 (Part 1-4) : 1992} tests. Wricks has demonstrated working performance with mortar test and temperature variation through a wall testing made of it. We achieved this using our proprietary composition comprising recycled plastic waste and inert waste (Construction waste, marble slurry, mining stone waste) as well as proprietary technology. We are a team of civil engineers and shareholder from a real estate background with more than 100 years of accumulative experience. Our objective is to provide a sustainable alternative to Rs. 1800 Crore Indian brick industry, while reducing waste management burden of society.

name: Mati Amrit Clay Industries Pvt. Ltd.
description: Mati Amrit is working on the principle "If past is connected with technology in present then a better future can be made" . To fulfill this purpose, the clay used to make Mati Amrit's pots is made only by mixing the soil based on the quality and pH level of soil after getting it tested in the laboratory. Through collaboration with Amrit Mati India Trust, we are doing research on the health, social, religious and economic importance of earthen pots. Especially with public awareness about the health benefits of earthen utensils. By using modern technology, opportunities for their more usage are also being created in new areas. In this context, we first got the food cooked in earthen pots lab tested from NIBL certified laboratory.It has been proven that if food is cooked in earthen pots, all types of essential nutrients in the food remains safe and the value can be increased up to 4 times as compared to other utensils. After this, water of Alkaline water jug made by Mati Amrit was tested by Indian Institute of Technology, Roorkee (Department of Hydro and Renewable Energy). In the test, 10 types of water samples taken from alkaline water jug were tested. Result after test:- The Alkaline Water Jug was observed to successfully improve the pH to the acceptable range for drinking water as per the standard specified by the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS). 11 families were randomly experimented to make and eat food in Mati Amrit's clay product for 3 months. After 3 months, the results tested by Dr. Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan Rajasthan Ayurved University of Jodhpur under the supervision of Vice Chancellor Mr. Pradeep Prajapati showed that the fasting blood sugar and LDL cholesterol had reduced and HDL cholesterol had increased, which shows that clay utensils helps in reducing Cardiovascular Complications. It also improves sleep cycle and digestion process of all age groups which enhance the quality of life.

name: Khushi Baby Association
description: Khushi Baby, founded in 2016, is a Section-8 non-profit organization based in Rajasthan, India, working at the intersection of public health and technology to improve delivery of community health care. Currently, our 35-member team serves as the Nodal Technical Service Provider to the Government of Rajasthan’s Department of Medical Health and Family Welfare. Our solution is a novel mobile health platform for accountable and longitudinal tracking of primary health care. The Khushi Baby team oversees the end-to-end process of design, development, deployment, monitoring and evaluation, and stakeholder engagement required to drive impact at scale. This platform is being used by over 60,000 community health workers in Rajasthan to deliver care to over 1.29 Cr beneficiaries over the last 4 months. Our platform has been recognized and supported by world-class partners in public health (UNICEF, GAVI the Global Alliance for Vaccines), research (Harvard Medical School and Yale School of Public Health), and technology (Google AI for Social Good, IDEMIA, MIT-SOLVE). The platform consists of two core solutions: a) longitudinal tracking of RCH and community health and b) COVID-19 active surveillance.

Customer can add product to cart then in cart there is just a sum up amount of 500 INR from each and every customer those who are purchasing from the website this amount is referred as booking amount for their purchase the sales executive then forward their proper estimate and after the finalization from the availability of stock the estimates are sent to the customer by using WhatsApp hence we receive their orders forms online from the back end we start processing later on the sales team ask for the payments in company bank account customer can also amend the orders before and after the payment adjustment are to be carried forward by the team and working is completed at the sales process by the team. Company is planning to hire 500 tele sales executive for the activity and space and allotments are required for these type of working. Corporate office is planned at Jaipur only. Further process moves with after receiving the payment from the customers accounts and inventory department coordinately start working with the order form account dept check for the payments and all the orders estimates they take printout currently we are using two software’s for the accounting one is Retail graph for inventory management and another is tally erp9. Inventory dept. packs the order shipment is booked by accounts. Dept and orders get delivered before time till date. The website have special benefits of d.no retailers and reseller can directly send the link of website to their clients and customers because their rates are confidential and they can easily work on the website on the same part. Being into this project from the age of 15 I have spent 5 years on the finalization of project and this project is loss proof project. It can go NPNL but never in negative. name: ADVANCED SOLUTIONS
description: We are a Home and commercial place automation company. We are into system installers and integrator for Home and Commercial place automation which includes Lights, Main gate, AIr conditioners, Audio Video Systems, Security , water control, and every existing device or equipment in those places. During this process we felt that the solutions offered are more of decorative and glamour giving, whereas the need of almost every client is utilitarian automation. We pin pointed the missing link and focused on developing devices which are useful in real sense and power saving also. So we developed and protyped the device and proceeding to make it available to the world in commercial terms. Ours is Automation hardware device and a in reply to query, please note: HUMAN PRESENCE: If we talk about Automation, after all it is for human beings. And so automation devices will be effective and of utility only if they could somehow know that a human is present at scene. CURRENT SCENARIO: No such device is commercially available to detect human presence with required precision. Be it PIR sensor, microwave sensor, ultrasonic sensor, IR sensor or any other technology based devices. They all have shortcomings. It does not warrant elaboration here anyhow. OUR FOCUS: Being a system installer and integration company basically, we faced this problem and learnt that no such solution is available. We started working on it and reached the prototype stage successfully Technology Used : Passive infrared sensing. Everything in this universe above absolute zero (-273 degree Kelvin scale) emit infrared energy, so do human. And everything or being has a specific range of IR. Is it a new technology : No, it is a very common technology and cheap sensors are readily available. But the problem is that it detects motion only. That’s the reason these are confined to be used in Washrooms, corridor etc. where the person is not expected to STAY. Our Device: Uses PIR sensing with input of our technology and system developed after Intrinsic blend study of Sensors, IOT, Materials , electrical and electronics together with our expertise of practical scenarios of home and commercial Place automation , is able to sense a STAIONARY HUMAN. This makes it suitable (or can say COMPULSORY) for every place Residential or commercial place where automation is required or sought after. Technology : PIR Sensing Availability of Components : EASY Impact on environment : NONE Power Saving : YES, Device own consumption in idle state is less that 60 micro ampere Device Life : 10 YEARS or more Service Requirements : NONE for stand alone Utility : Is for Automation as LATHE is for manufacturing Competition : None Yet, and doesn't appears to be easy. Licensing Requirement to use Any specific component : None Operating Voltage : 5V DC and 220 Volt AC

name: SIOMATE GROUP
description: Siomate Group™ has been established as a real innovative company in India. Siomate Group™ founded by Kaushik Lohar in 2018, Siomate Group™ is an innovative company based on the theme of Innovation cum Commercialization. We believe in ‘Connecting aspirations’, by offering innovative solutions. Our business model is based on the accomplishment of Innovation cum Commercialization. Our story began in 2018, Back then we were just a beginner with some ideas. Today we are privileged to connect with many curious minds and customers everyday with exceptional products. We are capable of manufacturing a diversity of custom parts to your exacting specifications. Siomate Group™ is the innovative start-up working on machinery, equipment that are needed to the 21st century. It all started with my dissertation, it was about how existing organizations create new capabilities. One of the surprising things that I learned was that if your project teams aren’t working effectively together you can say your capability development efforts goodbye. ” We’re scientists, engineers, business managers and marketers. Creators, collaborators, and award winners. And together, we’re using our combined skills to solve the world’s biggest challenges and bring about positive change, right now.” Our mission statement is to build long term relationships with our customers and clients and provide exceptional customer services by pursuing business through innovation and advanced technology. Our vision is to provide quality services that exceeds the expectations of our esteemed customers. Our values inform every decision we make, every step we take, as we drive toward our purpose to empower the world with the essential innovations to thrive. Our core values reflect the longstanding commitments of our innovative company, demonstrate our steadfast commitment to our people and the planet, and exemplify the way we work. These values are timeless and foundational to everything we do and help build the basis for the critical initiatives and commitments we have to sustainability, community impact, diversity & inclusion, and other ways in which we operate. Our purpose, "To empower the world with the essential innovations to thrive", evokes how we use our passion and proven expertise in science and innovation to create sustainable solutions for the complex challenges facing our world. Over the course of Siomate Group’s existence, we are proving that the most valuable and enduring business outcomes are the ones that are beneficial to society and help the planet thrive. Sustaining our planet, and our business, means protecting natural resources and empowering individuals and communities throughout the world to encourage progress. It means balancing economic, environmental and social factors while addressing global challenges. And above all else, it means uniting under a common goal, improve every life. At Siomate Group, we strive to operate in the best interest of our people, the communities in which we live and work, and the environments surrounding our facilities across the globe. Science and engineering are the foundation of our essential innovations. For over two years, we’ve been innovating around you. As this is the most innovative era and we have to walk parallel to this. We have done three innovations and still counting. All three innovations are for agriculture purposes, and those innovations are, Multifunctional agro machine, Multifunctional gardening machine and Standard digging equipment. These innovations are mainly used for aeration, seed’s plantation, fertilization, levelling the ground, ploughing, farming, and digging. These Siomate machines/innovations are quite related to agriculture purpose and it’s a good tribute to the Indian agriculture, to the farmers who cannot afford the expensive equipment, machines. All these Innovations are idealized & invented by Mr. Kaushik Lohar, and we are still counting. The main purpose behind his innovation is, there is no financial barriers for any farmer and anyone can afford it without hesitation. The best segment about his innovations is, it can be operated either manually or automatically. There is no electricity required for manually operated versions. name: Photom Technologies Private Limited
description: Photom Technologies is a cleantech startup revolutionizing solar operations through robotic, waterless cleaning systems that eliminate soiling losses in utility-scale solar PV plants. In arid and semi-arid regions, solar panels lose up to 30% of their efficiency due to dust accumulation. Traditional cleaning methods are water-intensive, labor-dependent, and often inconsistent — especially across large solar fields. Photom addresses this with autonomous, dry-cleaning robots that work without water, require no additional infrastructure, and are compatible with both fixed tilt and seasonal tilt structures. Built with lightweight frames, microfiber helical brushes, and IoT-based monitoring, our patented solution ensures consistent cleaning, reduces O&M costs, and improves energy generation. Since inception, Photom has deployed its technology across 950+ MW at 25+ plants across 6 Indian states, with clients like Stride Climate Investments. We’ve saved over 540 million liters of water and reduced 72,000+ tons of CO₂ emissions annually. Photom generates revenue through direct product sales, supported by AMC-based service offerings. We are now expanding our portfolio to include integrated panel inspection systems, smart trackers, and an AI-powered predictive O&M platform — moving toward our vision of building the intelligent infrastructure backbone for solar energy’s future.

At GharKhana.co every chef has been handpicked for their exceptional culinary skills and the highest standards of cleanliness. The platform is in testing / trials phase and not available publicly. Parallelly, we are onboarding potential home chefs, we have already finalised 30+ home kitchens and their training has started. We are planning to start operations in July 2020.

name: De Calorie Energy Consultant LLP
description: De Calorie Energy Consultant is an experienced and passionate company of consultants evolving in sustainability in the built environment. We at De Calorie are working to elevate the role of green buildings beyond the environment and economy and focus on the personal health and well-being benefits. As a green building consultant, we help or support project team to incorporate sustainable practices in their projects. Our Mission is to provide most effective means for attaining a range of global objectives, such as addressing climate transformation, crafting sustainable and thriving communities, and motivating economic growth. Our main objective comprises of :- 1. We provide training's and spread awareness towards sustainability in various government and private departments. 2. To protect mother earth. 3. Sustainable development. 4. Awareness towards energy efficiency and explanation on water scarcity in future. So, we can use energy and water in more effective way. 5. We offer expert advisory and assessment services to clients with the aim of minimizing or eliminating environmental damage. 6. Focus on health and indoor air quality. Protecting occupant health and improving employee productivity. We propose solutions that are practical, cost effective and carried with a commitment to protecting our global environment and our limited natural resources. We embrace new technology and seek to update others how such technologies can be integrated into design enabling architects and clients to make informed decisions regarding the creation of the best possible environment within budget. Once building optimized and received green rating, the actual energy performance , when the building starts functioning, may have significant variation from the simulated performance due to climate variability, actual occupancy, operating efficiency of equipment, hours of operation, to name a few.

name: SOFT-INNOV TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
description: Couriero is a next-generation courier aggregation platform revolutionizing logistics with powerful AI automations. Our latest innovation introduces a chat-based system on our platform where users can create, edit, or delete orders and shipments effortlessly — just by messaging. These AI automations can be triggered directly through the Couriero dashboard, WhatsApp via the registered mobile number, or even through a simple phone call. Couriero is integrated with all leading courier companies, offering users a unified ecosystem with real-time rate comparisons, serviceability checks, insurance options for shipments, and complete end-to-end tracking. Our platform connects seamlessly with Shopify, Amazon, and WooCommerce, enabling effortless shipping management for businesses of all sizes. We are in advanced talks with Indian Railways to introduce Railway Logistics into our network, opening a new era of high-speed, cost-efficient deliveries across India. With Couriero, users benefit from a powerful combination of technology, extensive courier partnerships, insurance coverage, and the upcoming railway logistics infrastructure — creating an unmatched logistics ecosystem under one roof.

We aim to provide better access to consumers. We want to make sure that they are not "bound" by logistical or technological barriers while selling the products. Problem 1: There is an income gap in what the artists get versus what they actually deserve. Most of the margin gets reduced due to the multitude of middlemen/trading.                   Solution: We aim to provide them with a platform with access to consumers at a global level. Problem 2: Secondly, the artists, especially in non-tier1 cities and rural areas, face logistical and technological challenges.                   Solution: Dhayas aims to provide them with the required amenities. The above two problems are perennial and Dhayas brings in a scalable solution that will not only help in the economic development of the artists but will also help in job creations. Problem 3- thirdly artist are not well versed with NFT and its market Solution- We are proving platform to create Art NFT platform to guide each abou same.

description: Altie Reality Private Limited is a Metaverse company making AR and VR accessible to the masses through its XR platforms. We are a silver-rated startup, recognized by iStart Rajasthan. We are currently developing LearnXR, an XR and AI-powered tool for teachers to get started with XR teaching. It is an innovative solution designed for XR and AI-assisted learning in the 21st century. We hope to democratize access to affordable and high-quality learning through our Cardboard VR-compatible LearnXR Android app, thereby enhancing the child's natural learning skills through extended reality and artificial intelligence. Altie Reality Private Limited, founded during the COVID-19 outbreak phase, is a company of tech enthusiasts aiming to bring the extended reality experience to the masses at a low cost. With the introduction of 5G in 2022, it is time to bring virtual and augmented reality experiences to the masses. With a strong team of IITians and engineers from top colleges in India, we plan to bring the next technological changes to education, tourism, gaming, and retail shopping experiences. With 5G being introduced in 2021, it is just the right time to move to the metaverse way of life.

name: SAMPURN ORGANIC PRIVATE LIMITED
description: Sampurn Organic Private Limited is an organization focused in the field of Organic farming & trading of high quality organic food products. The founders of the company are, Sunita Chahar, an educated, health conscious home maker from agriculture farming cum business background family and Raja Brij Bhusan, an IT professional currently running his own IT company in the area of tiger surveillance project across national parks in India. Sampurn Organic started its operations since July 2014 and has its own farm land which is in process of organic certification. The objective of Sampurn Organic is to spread awareness about the benefits of organic farming and motivate farmers for organic farming. Its marketing division is going to help farmers sell their organic products across India. The organization is committed to provide organic food for healthy living to Indian consumers. Sampurn Organic has “In conversion organic farm” in Bharatpur (Raj). Company has its own packaging unit in Bharatpur, in Brij region located 55 km of Agra and 35 km from Mathura. Bharatpur is a part of Delhi’s National Capital Region (NCR) and is famous for Keoladeo National Park. Sampurn Organic is currently setting up its distribution network across National Capital region, in Bharatpur, Jaipur and Agra. Organic products will reach the consumers via national and regional retails chain, Cash & Carry stores, e commerce portals and home delivery. Farming for vegetable will take place in the district of Bharatpur, Agra and Mathura. Company will work with 5000+ farmers in the Brij region to promote Organic Farming. Ecocert India Private Limited is the Organic Certification agency for Sampurn Organic farming, processing & trading units.

name: GEEREV PRIVATE LIMITED
description: GEEREV is the only and first startup to provide end to end solution for retrofitting of petrol fuel based two-wheeler into electric two-wheeler with manual transmission gear. GEEREV provides transmission gear in converted two-wheeler that makes electric vehicle preferable to use on any off road tracks also and have high speed just like a petrol fuel based vehicle. Our mission is to provide a one stop solution for two-wheeler conversion replacing petrol fuel two-wheeler with same compatibility, usability, durability and adaptability. GEEREV already developed an innovative and first transmission gear box based conversion into electric vehicle and have an eye on launching first ever bike with transmission gear box in 5 digit price only.

name: Augna AR Technologies
description: AugnaAR Technologies is a startup company of students of Rajasthan Technical University which deals with the Augmented Reality based solutions. Augmented reality (AR) is an interactive experience of a real-world environment where the objects that reside in the real world are enhanced by computer-generated perceptual information, sometimes across multiple sensory modalities, including visual, auditory, haptic, somatosensory and olfactory. AugnaAR will provide solutions in many sectors such as: Education, Real estate, e-commerce, industry and manufacturing etc. Starting with the education sector, AugnaAR introduces the first product named MentAR. MentAR is an application which is designed for the needs of all i.e., a teacher, a student, a professor, etc. In this pandemic time students are not able to study at any institute, the private school’s tuition fees are more so parents are shifting their children to government schools, but we all know that government school teachers are less preferred over private ones. Even the private ones have to teach online, which is difficult to do so because explaining the same without being physical is problematic. Because of the above reasons and great visual effects more and more students are preferring online educating services like, Vedantu, Byju’s etc. Even after doing so, students are not satisfied, they say that the importance of physical teacher cannot be replaced whether it be smart classes or online education services. Here comes the MentAR, which acts as a bridge between the conventional teaching and modern teaching. MentAR is designed such that: A teacher can increase his/her teaching skills through great visual effects. A student can understand everything by referring the textbook as it mostly covers the syllabus. Apart from the syllabus some basic knowledge is visualized. It is useful even after the pandemic when everyone starts joining schools physically.

name: Workboratory Innovations
description: Our product MedeeSmart aims at reducing the hassle of physically going to the hospital to book a doctor’s appointment. In the humdrum of the city life, it can be a big task to wait in lines in a hospital just for an appointment. Also, people from small villages and towns have to travel to cities to book an appointment for doctors who have their dates booked months in advance. Moreover, in the age of digitization and this pandemic, it’s important to promote paperless and contact-less services. As medical industry is growing with increasing corporate hospital chains and growing number of doctors, the major issue still remains for safekeeping of medical reports which are extremely personal to a person. To solve this problem our application provides a safe vault/locker where patient can store his/her medical records safely. None of the current system aims to provide a platform to safely secure these medical records and prescriptions and it certainly has a huge potential in it. MedeeSmart will provide a platform to the users to book doctor’s appointments in a personalized manner. It will provide filters to give a more personalized view to the user. The said filters will include a rating filter and a fees filter, so that the user can view the doctor in their price range and the expected ratings. Moreover, this will help in making the whole database of prescriptions online. This platform will be available for android, ios and as a web application as well.

name: ARIYAPPA GROUP OF INDUSTRIES
description: Ariyappa Group of Industries (AGI) provides solutions to various problems of farmers. These problems are analyzed after a two month survey in Banswara district. The main problems are (a) Illiteracy -They don’t have the knowledge of how and when to use Urea and Pesticides in crops. Sometimes they mix the Pesticides and use it over the crops. As a result crops get destroyed. AGI provides the solution of this problem through its consultants. They will guide the Farmers after visiting them to solve their problems from time to time. (b)Farmers don’t get the required products on time at govt. rate .AGI gives the solution to this problem by providing the product to them under the marginal rate . They will get the products either at their home or at nearby location decided by the AGI . (c)Risk cover -Now farmers need not to visit the remote areas for buying as well as for selling. They will save their time, cost and risk during transportation(accidental damage) . (d)Selling Market for Farmers -AGI will buy the Organic products from farmers. It will help the farmers to set an example for others because farmers are interested to go for ORGANIC farming but they don’t have end users those con buy from them. Now AGI will solve these problems by buying the products from them. The main benefits of this by doing so are: Shifting From Inorganic to organic farming. For farmers” Buying under marginal price and Selling at good price.” How AGI works -1.Farmers can directly order through Ariyappa.com. It is an online platform managed by AGI. If they don’t have knowledge about this, they can take help of POS ((Point of sale) A Point through which they can order and collect the order.)2.POS now will forward the order to DM (District Manager- manages ware house. Now DM will execute the order under the guidance of AGI. In This way AGI is also providing the opportunity in service sector for unemployed youth. The main motive AGI is “Selling under marginal price and Buying at good price.”

name: 4Gig Tech
description: India's only digital ledger book app which lends you money for the business. Credit Khata App (Ledger Account App) is a completely Safe, 100% Free, Simple and Secure way to maintain your Udhar bahi khata. It will help to replace your ledger cash book on this digital platform. Credit Khata not only maintains and records credit (Jama) and debit (Udhaar) transactions for your trusted customers but also helps you to get Data-Driven Finance Loans or Capital Money to fulfill orders from customers who maintain good transaction record on Credit Khata book app. The best app to replace your pen, paper and calculator and offline Bahi Khata with this digital ledger Cash Book which has many great features like: * CK App is and will always be 100% Free * Credit Khata app helps you to get invoice financing and get loans or capital money * Completely safe, simple, undocumented and secure udhaar bahi khata * Multiple admins can maintain the same account and admin rights can also be decided by the owner * Multiple businesses in a simple app * Check which business has added you as a customer with balance and transactions * Free SMS updates to customers for every transaction * All entries backed up Online securely * Maintain Personal Khata to manage udhaar/len-den book of friends & family * Send payment reminders on WhatsApp and free SMS * Download transaction PDF Report and share with your CA for Tally entry from mobile * Set payment reminder date for your customer * Set App Lock to Secure your account book Credit Khata is useful for shopkeepers and small businesses doing len den on diary or register and paying a good amount of money just to make those entries on the tally. Now share customers and transaction reports directly with CA for GST returns.

name: KESARI BHARAT REMOTE NAVIGATION SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
description: The Kesari Bharat project is all about creating indigenous maps of India. A mobile and web mapping application which will provide services to B2B and B2C customers fully functional navigational and mapping solutions, to help them track, mark, identify the real-time location of a used electronic device such as vehicle tracking device or mobile phone in their system. An example of B2B services is off services to fleet management companies, school buses, transport services, and taxis who want to track the real-time location of their vehicle or electronic device. The present invention relates generally to navigation, and more particularly, to geolocation information associated with resources on electronic devices connecting with data server to geographic referencing systems and, more particularly, to a method and system for providing an indication of location, so as to facilitate the operation of such location-based services.

name: Bidathlete
description: For Tournament Organizers, maintaining excel sheets for each and every task becomes really tedious and that is where BidAthlete comes in where everything is automated and you can download data anytime you want. BidAthlete also helps you get more sponsors for your tournament as you can advertize your sponsors on the auction screen. BidAthlete is a completely free player auction website where teams can bid on players participating in a sports tournament. There are lots of sports that the platform supports like Cricket, Football, Volleyball etc. You dont need to add players yourself. You can just share the registration form link and the players can register themselves in the auction. We also provide live streaming overlay for facebook and youtube. There is also a shareable auction summary screen available where you can download auction data and can check the status of auction live from anywhere. You can also add your tournament sponsors and we will promote them on multiple screens and will make sure that your sponsors gets the best value out of the auction.

name: NIRO INDIA MEDITECH PRIVATE LIMITED
description: Niro India A comprehensive health monitoring system to combat the COVID-19 pandemic by providing an added safety measure for people. Niro india consist of three Parts of there Application one Is For users and Other One Is For establishment and Third one Is for Doctors. Niro india Meditech Pvt Ltd Established In 16.07.2020. Niro India for users - Users register themselves on the app through Aadhar or any Government issued ID (For those which do not have Aadhar or do not have their contact number linked to their ID). They will be provided with a unique QR code which they can keep on their app or in physical form by downloading and printing it out or getting in through a designated facility. Niro India Provide Consult With To Our Users At Free of cost. II. Niro India for Establishments - App for establishments to check the current status of the users perform screening on the users upon their visit. Establishments can register themselves through the app after providing necessary information like name, locations and proof of establishments. They will be provided a unique login code. They can check the current status of users and enter the screening results through the app itself. Our system will mark the user as “safe” or “at risk” according to the result. III. Niro India for doctors - Only Doctors will have the power to change the status of a user once it has been marked at risk. Doctors can register themselves on the app by entering the basic details like Name, Specialization and registration number.

name: Frolic HealthTech. Private Limited
description: Frolic HealthTech. Private Limited, incorporated in Jaipur in August 2020, founded by alumnus of Amity University Rajasthan, is working towards developing a platform that will help in inculcating the importance of health and fitness among individuals and the compassion towards other living beings. With the advent of growing needs and globalization, humans have been left with no compassion towards other living beings and also to maintain a balanced healthy life for themselves. He is searching for life on other planets rather than making an ecological balance on earth itself. We are providing an online platform for not only humans but animals as well, which caters to the health and fitness of both living beings. Thus, helping in creating an ecological balance and sustainable life. The team is working in the direction of developing a single mobile platform that can provide all the health and related activities with a single click, be it making new friends over sports or activity related to health or fitness, finding a place to play sports, searching a gym or yoga center nearby, taking an appointment of a doctor, booking an online yoga or fitness class, purchasing health and fitness related products and many more features. Not only this, the app will help individuals to develop compassion to help animals on road, and connect them with NGOs, also their pets can be involved in a community of other pet owners. Overall, our goal is to make provide an ecological balance on earth through health, fitness, and sports. Further, as a company, we believe in social responsibility towards humans and animals both, therefore apart from our tech-oriented social platform our brand "Cognitive Solutions" deals in providing education to poor children, women, etc. Also, this brand helps street animals with their treatment, feeding, birth control, etc.

name: La Fiza Private Limited
description: La Fiza is a handcrafted footwear brand for women, offering traditional designs with a modern twist. With a focus on sustainability, over 80% of our products are vegan and cruelty-free. La Fiza has gained recognition in the industry and is available in luxury and major multi-brand outlets across India. We achieved impressive sales and served over 1000 customers last year. The founder's passion for fashion and entrepreneurship led to the creation of La Fiza. We invested in proper planning and survived the challenges of the COVID-19 pandemic. The brand's unique selling points include empowering women artisans, a wide variety of designs, competitive pricing, and uncompromising quality standards. We also provide customization options and cater to various size preferences. La Fiza solves common problems in the footwear industry, such as high prices, size issues, and return complications. We offer sustainable handcrafted designs, an extensive range of options, competitive pricing, and a well-designed size chart. Our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has resulted in a lower return rate compared to industry standards. With a vision to become a profitable global brand, La Fiza aims to open retail outlets in all the major cities of India within the next 3 to 5 years. By choosing La Fiza, customers support a brand that cares for animals and the environment while enjoying stylish and comfortable footwear. Join the La Fiza journey and experience the perfect blend of tradition and modernity. Step into elegance with their handcrafted footwear and be part of a brand that is redefining the industry.

name: TECHSHLOK RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT PRIVATE LIMITED
description: We provide a platform where Startups/ Innovators can outsource their electronics design and development needs and get their work done by experienced professionals within time. Innovation - Introducing "LoadPe" that provides a single platform for all the users, business person, companies, and organization to send the parcel, other items within the city and outside the city in a single click. LoadPe is a SaaS (Software as a Service) for users and transporters that make it unique and innovative. Transporters don't directly need to connect with users. LoadPe will bring the users for the logistic companies and transporters. Users also don't need to connect with logistic companies or transporters for any query, booking etc. LoadPe as a SaaS will solve all kinds of problems. A user does not need to connect with logistic companies or transporters. We'll be the single line for all users. Scalability - It'll start with a couple of cities and spread at the PAN India level. name: Stepfly Innovations Private Limited
description: Problem Our Startup is solving - Students, at times, lack the resources & support to prepare for the pressure faced while appearing for competitive exams. Specially when a student is preparing for descriptive(written) exam, teachers are hard to find, who can evaluate student's answer sheet and give them marks. Student is often put in a position to self evaluate him/herself. The learning is very slow in such cases. While there are experts available, there is no medium/platform which can connect them to needy students at the right time and at right cost. How does our startup propose to solve this problem - We aim to simulate real exam environment by providing a platform: 1. with huge no. of students competing at the same time, i.e. (preparing students for real pressure) 2. with personalized feedback services by subject experts, i.e. (helping students improve their exam scores) At StepFly, we have multiple mock tests which user can attempt and submit their answer sheet. We at StepFly get it evaluated by our subject experts and give evaluated answer sheet back to students. This entire process is automated. Uniqueness of the solution - Personalized feedback and marks (evaluated answer sheet by subject expert) of user is fed into the app by StepFly team. It actually merges online practice performance (content practiced within the app) and offline practice performance of user. Subject experts can deliver their services through the platform directly to needy students. Opportunities are matched with experts using algorithms developed by StepFly based on: 1. Expert's knowledge level 2. Time limit for delivering a user specific service 3. Expert's past record of delivering service on StepFly

name: MeetAI Private Limited
description: BidRyd is an amazon-like marketplace for rides where passengers can create rides and drivers who want to serve can bid on these rides. A rider can create a ride by mentioning relevant details such as source, destination, date and departure time of ride. We suggest these rides to most suited drivers using our AI-based ride recommendation algorithm. BidRyd drivers get the personalized ride feed (similar to how Facebook shows personalized news feed), which can help them to earn big profits. Drivers can also manually search for the rides available in a neighborhood. Driver can choose any ride that they like and can make a bid for it. Riders can see top bids on their ride anytime. Riders will be informed whenever the lowest bid changes on their ride. Riders can choose a suitable driver with reasonable price and book their ride by making an advance payment if required. BidRyd charges a 10% commission to drivers if monthly revenue is less than 30K and 15% for the revenue above than 30K. BidRyd recommendation engine recommends most profitable rides to drivers. Suppose a driver has a booked ride from ‘A’ to ‘B’ then recommendation will suggest rides originating from B’s neighborhood to ‘A’.

name: KEENDROID PRIVATE LIMITED
description: In today’s scenario school transportation lacks a robust and secure system for student management. GPS is not enough to track students. It only tracks buses, not the students inside it. Schools and Parents face significant barriers to choose school transportation and entry/exit solutions for its inadequate information and lack of quality options. We believe the existing system is not enough for safety and tracking of students. Not any more, it’s high time for us to dramatically reshape school transport priorities and needs. There were many cases reported in the recent years wherein many school students were found to be missing and abducted in India. In India, an estimated 96,000 children go missing each year - Bachpan Bachao Andolan, Missing Children of India. As per the Report published by Statista Research Department, In 2021, there were over 101 thousand kidnapping and abduction cases reported in India. The leading reason for this crime was missing children deemed as kidnapped with over 28 thousand cases that year. Therefore, considering the above reports and security needs for the benefit of schools, parents and students, we have designed a unique security system so as to keep the full track of the students and provide information on real time basis to their parents. This helps to avoid any panic situation for schools/transporters/parents. We understand that “Every child in the class is someone’s whole world.” We believe in keeping the students safe and promoting social and creative learning. The safety of students on campus has become a high priority in many countries. We believe school tracking system is a delicate balance of maintaining a free, open, welcoming, creative and educational atmosphere while still offering a secure location for students to learn and ease parent's worries. We believe safety in schools is necessary to support the academic success of each student, giving them the opportunity to learn and achieve in a safe and nurturing environment.

name: Airiac Systems Private Limited
description: A Green ecofriendly Air Conditioning without compressor and without any harmful gases ,it saves electricity upto 30-40%, Environment friendly and doesn't harm the environment or ozone layer in any form. The prime idea behind this invention is - When our sweat evaporates from our body we feel cool. In this Green AC we are first using a Polymer Coated very thin membrane (This technology basically needs to be patented).The Air is first dehumidified through this membrane ,where Water will be separated from the Humid air and the left ever dry air will be passed through Evaporative cooling. The water is separated from the Humid air is as pure as RO water and can be used for drinking purpose. The dry air passing through evaporative cooling system will give exactly same cooling what we get through conventional Air Conditioners. This technology will save the environment from getting heated,it's environment friendly,will saves electricity charges as we are not using any sort of Compressor or any harmful gases. Even the cost of this Green AC will be almost 40% less than that of conventional Air Conditioning systems which makes it affordable for almost every section of the society. During Pilot we have plans to use solar power for our Green AC in ambition to provide a cooking systems for every home in almost negligible cost. We have plans to set up manufacturing unit in Rajasthan and our prime source of revenue would be direct selling to customers. We can even go for building a Franchise network all over India to make the reach as much as we can. Marketing Strategy would be direct selling ,advertisement through social media i.e digital marketing,Exhibitions etc. Requirements - Mentorship,Lab and Space,Funding.

name: FARMKAL KISAN AGRI PRIVATE LIMITED
description: At Farmkal we have been working for 4 years in agriculture full time. As technology is advancing day by day, agriculture will also be the biggest beneficiary of this, but few important issues - 1 . Equipment and Farm Planning - As farms are getting small and, it is important to plan the equipment usage to increase the efficiency and working hours of the equipment. 2. Finance - In rural India, farmers usually do not pay instantly for the service they use, as they promise to pay the amount after selling crops in mandi, this problem has a dual effect as it increases the task for machine owner to collect money from all the farmers he worked for and this also leads to decrease in quality of work done by machine owner as he knows this farmer is going to pay me late or less and ultimately this decreases the production. 3. Unorganized 2nd Hand Equipment trading market - As farms are getting smaller, farmers prefer to buy used equipment instead of new ones and this is opening up immense opportunities for an organized player in the market which can fulfill the trade of used equipment between farmers transparently. We have made our App after understanding the problem regarding agriculture equipment renting and trading, and after meeting and discussing with 100's farmers we have found various problems that need to be solved with an empathetic approach. Our App offer solution to these problems - 1.We are integrating a use-now pay-later service where farmers can pay the machine owner's rent instantly from our app and can pay us later after 30-45 days interest-free. 2.Our AI-based equipment planner helps the equipment owner to plan the equipment work, send reminder to farmers about payment and let farmers book equipment in advance and rate the work of the mach owner. 3. We have developed a Used Equipment Trading platform where Farmers can Trade used equipment.

To battle the upcoming series of calamities, we need to come up with alternatives that redesign the idea of an unquestionable future- and that's certainly what's called Net Zero! A concept born out of integrating solar power with sufficiency and sustainability, NET ZERO is a groundbreaking method to tap one source of energy that's sure to convert the world into a cleaner and better destination for the upcoming generations to thrive on! "For energy to be inexhaustible, you need technology that's sustainable" Today's energy resource might not guarantee you a supply for tomorrow. The pioneers of sustainable energy, we design excellent BUILDING ENERGY solutions for an uninterrupted SUSTAINABLE experience. The company is constantly working towards achieving green society by solemnly working towards the Carbon footprint & its offsets. We care for nature! We plant trees for creating extra value for our customers' life and with it, we plant hopes for our future generations. We are on a mission to plant numerous trees. As to achieve a Green & sustainable society, we decided to take a step towards procuring nature by planting trees on various properties. We started ‘Mission Chayya’ to secure the ecosystem and reduce or reverse the damage done to the environment. We along with our clients, contributing towards this noble cause are upholding environmental conservation ensuring to make this world a better place. The company is rigorously working to take Clean Energy Solutions along with Sustainable Technology to Urban & rural areas to create an actual impact in society by converting those areas & towns into SMART Society by integrating its innovating energy, water management & air quality solutions. Our Segments of Focus: Renewable Energy (SOLAR & WIND), Sustainable cooling solutions, Energy Monitoring Bots, CARBON footprint Management, Green Buildings & ZERO ENERGY BUILDINGS.

name: EF Polymer Private Limited
description: The agriculture sector around the world facing the big problem of water for irrigation and after cultivation waste management including after consuming waste. We came up with the idea to utilize this waste in the most efficient manner without creating any kind of pollution. We developed an Eco-Friendly Water Retention Natural Polymer named "Fasal Amrit" which is able to absorb 300 times more water than its own weight for as long as 10-12 days. It helps to reduce irrigation water requirement by 30-40% along with a 40-50% reduction in fertilizer because it prevents the leaching of fertilizer causes 10-20% fertilizer loss. The "Fasal Amrit" itself is made from organic waste hence it has a great number of micronutrients to support the better growth of crop/plant. It is totally organic in nature, chemical-free, pollution-free, and what is interesting, it is 100% biodegradable in the soil after 5-6 months of application. The farmers can reduce their cost of water and fertilizer by 20-40% and can increase the yield by 10-20%. The application of "Fasal Amrit" is including but is not limited to in-house plants to save them for a week or two in case you are not at your home to water them, keep your garden green forever by reducing the daily watering cycle, enhance the growth of your plant in an organic way, save your plant far from your home or on hilly areas where it is difficult for your water them daily, etc.

India’s dependence on an increasingly erratic monsoon for its water requirements increases this challenge. Climate change is likely to exacerbate this pressure on water resources, even as the frequency and intensity on floods and droughts in the country increases Innovative and implementable solutions are the need of the hour to stem this potential country-wide water crisis and make sure that India’s citizen get access to the elixir of life. To Fulfill This Himalayan Water Science Stand With Multiple Patented Ideas To Distribute NetZero Water waste Solutions As Per NITI Aayog and ISHARE and ASHRAE Green Building Solutions The Company intends to manufacturer a special type of membrane and AI based Master Controller which became mind of every RO system (desalination unit like ED, nanofiltration )that is easily replacing RO membrane in any existing RO plants. This will Reduce consumer’s initial investment price an membranes without purchasing a new RO machine. These changes provide customers balance mineral water for drinking purpose and also reduce RO plants wastage At affordable Prices. Water Purification industry is India’s Top 10 Industries This acquires more than 100 Million Dollar involvement Already. we don’t disturb this industry we provide great initiative to the industry. This solves all problems regarding to RO water industries. EQUIPMENT: An Artificial Intelligence based which control water waste and provide mineral drinking water by our Patented membranes and Separate Units compatible with any domestic and Commercial RO units. Both Ideas Indian Patent Is Received with Patent No. 511937 for AI based Water Purification & Advance Mineral Balancing Membrane Patent No. 382475

name: Beliveinn Tech Pvt Ltd
description: The company is objected towards Green technology development & research, we aim to design & develop ingenious products characterized to provide resourceful solutions to various intricate challenges on a global scale. Our prime innovation the hybrid focuses on using the energy potential present in the area to generate electricity from the most abundant natural energy resources i.e. solar and wind energy. The hybrid hosts a concentrated solar energy module which concentrates the solar energy from different angles of sunlight as per the movement of sun throughout the day to focus on small high intensity mono PV module for energy generation. Along with this, the hybrid incubates low speed wind energy turbine to use the wind energy present in rural areas from open spaces and in urban areas through wind channels created by buildings, and turbulences in wind created by movement of automobiles and other systems. Apart from this the hybrid includes a three layer air purification system for extracting the pollutants, other harmful bacteria and viruses from the surrounding air. The electricity generated by the product is utilized by the air purification system in smaller amounts while the rest abundant energy is moved to provide power back to the main grid of the nearby area. The company aims to develop in-area grid plants which accumulate no. of units in particular vicinity for energy generation and wind purification. This will reduce the overall cost of transportation of electricity, increase the efficiency of energy generation as per need and reduce air pollution throughout the area of setup leading to suitable environmental conditions and reducing health risks for the population within the vicinity. Further the grid can be used to power charging stations for upcoming electric vehicles which will be replacing the current market scenario by wholesome in the future.

name: Minimines Cleantech Solutions Private Limited
description: MiniMines: A sustainable and efficient Li-Ion battery recycling clean-tech solution. MiniMines is a part of a revolution in the electric vehicle ecosystem to create a circular economy for energy storage devices (Li-Ion), which includes sourcing and collection of the spent batteries and recovery of precious battery-grade materials. The complete ecosystem is based on advanced research and environment sustainable processes. 1. Mini Mines has its own IP-protected technology and proprietary closed-loop method. This environmentally clean approach, without any harmful emissions, caters to the UN sustainable development goals (SDGs) towards carbon neutrality. 2. Mini Mines proprietary process reproduces battery-grade materials of lithium, cobalt, magnesium, nickel for re-entry into the supply chain required for Li-ion cell manufacturing. This will create an indigenous supply of raw materials and will reduce the foreign dependency for sourcing of the raw materials. Innovation: The hydrometallurgy process mainly involves preparing an aqueous solution of a salt of the metal and recovering the metal from the solution. The operations usually involved are leaching, or dissolution of the metal or metal compound in water, commonly with additional agents; separation of the waste and purification of the leach solution; and the precipitation of the metal or one of its pure compounds from the leach solution by chemical or electrolytic means. The most common leaching agent is dilute sulfuric acid. These extracted compounds are then further purified for end-use applications. This process gives an extraction efficiency of more than 90%.

description: Rehab Buddy works on the problem statement of an unbalanced ratio between multidisciplinary rehabilitation services demand and supply. In India research shows that psychiatric and pediatric cases are increasing and getting worse due to irregular rehabilitation therapies. The factors responsible for such conditions are - Lack of time, feasibility & conveyance for patient (client) / caregivers. Lack of rehab professionals & accessibility to multidisciplinary rehab services. No specialized patient growth monitoring system in rehab services. Lack of education & awareness among clients and patients. Unable to receive regular rehab therapy treatment. Lack of market and awareness of therapeutic tools & devices. The solution is Multidisciplinary Tele-rehabilitation providing occupational therapy, physiotherapy, clinical psychology, and special education services by an easily accessible mobile application including a patient’s monitoring system, automated progress report, regular self-assessments, tailored home treatment plan by professional, notification for activity & exercise to patient and caregiver followed by checklist. 200+ demonstration videos for various diseases, syndromes & conditions & tele- therapy sessions through video calls, audio calls, and chat. It also consists of an E-store for therapeutic tools & equipment for feasible purchase as per recommendation by professionals.
