name: MOLECULAM PRIVATE LIMITED
description: An increase in the demand and consumption of paper and due to the depletion of wood resources, the alternative resources including non-wood fibres, such as agricultural residues is considered as valid sources of cellulose for pulp and paper production. Properties that make them suitable include high yielding ability, high pulping quality, good adaptation to prevailing climatic conditions and low-cost. Non wood biomass pulping plays a vital role in pulp supply and regional agricultural residue utilization . These materials are environmentally friendly, cheap and have a vast availability that can meet the demand and consumption of paper in an economy without competing with food and land. In today’s time the pre-existing techniques have many flaws which need to be improved by gradual experimentations, also the conventional process is not applicable, as Silica and Ash content of straws and by-products are high. Lignocellulosic Biomass is basically made up of lignin, cellulose, hemicellulose, Silica and Ash which further after treatment can be extracted and converted into various different products. The type of method used usually influences the products formed and their yield along with the various by-products formed to a great extent. The aim of our process has been to maximize yields of fractions with high purity to make quality that can sustain market standards along with environmental care. The developed process is closed loop, which not only saves energy by utilising its complex chemistry but also recycles the reagents that do not require inputs except raw material after start. The Products are recovered and converted into finished products. For eg. The cellulose streams are converted into paper and lignin can be added to coatings and adhesives. We would have two main sources of revenue out of which the primary source would be product sales, then in form of royalty for transfer technology to interested parties.

Food innovation is the need of the hour to inculcate nutrition value in diet of Indian food. The last such grain that grew recognition in India and worldwide was oats which people have started to believe is a healthy choice. What supergrain we are offering has more nutritious value than oats. "Spent grain" is a massively overlooked potential source of human nutrition that accounts for 85% of the brewing industry’s byproducts. Think of it similarly to how whey protein is produced as the cheese industry's primary byproduct. Spent Grain is considered a rich source of fiber, protein, and phenolic compounds. 95 percent of Indians don’t meet their daily fibre requirement. If you make a list of top 10 foods with high fibre the highest would be chia seeds with 34g fibre per 100g. Aged and Baked spent grain flour consists of more than 50 percent fibre.We plan to develop an ecosystem around it with other lined up products such as protein chips, protein bread, ready to eat items and want to leverage spent grain in all this.

Currently functioning from stations in - Rajasthan (17 Stations) - Gujarat (3 Stations) We intend to cover 100 stations in year 1 and each station for which we will employ locals to manage the bookings. name: Alniya Rajeevika Mahila Sarvangin Vikas Sahkari Samiti Limited Alniya
description: Alniya Rajeevika Mahila Sarvangin Vikas Sahkari Samiti started the production of its wide range of products post Covid-19. The pandemic affected economies worldwide, with poor and marginalised women being among the hardest hit. The founders of Alniya, Ms Sangeeta Goud, Ms Bisha Devi and Ms Nilesh Singh hailing from Keval Nagar, Kota were among those finding it difficult to generate income in the post-covid world. However, guided by their entrepreneurial drive along with assistance from Rajeevika, they began the manufacture of handmade personal care products and cleaning agents such as soaps, handwash, detergents and so on. They were able to sell enough products to make a living and now plan to extend that opportunity to 30 other women like them through the scaling up of operations, providing a much needed alternative source of livelihood for rural women. Giving these women the opportunity to earn a living to support themselves and their families lies at the core of Alniya's business endeavours. Therefore, funding provided to Alinya would not only amount to an investment in their excellent hand-crafted products but also the potential of rural women. The cooperative would also benefit tremendously from having the opportunity to consult with mentors who have considerable expertise in creating and sustaining successful businesses whether it is in terms of market research, the scaling up of operations or marketing in order to reach as many customers as possible. It is our belief that funding and mentorship that can be provided by an initiative like iStart is what Alniya requires in order to offer an opportunity for sufficient income generation and a secure future for many more rural women and their families.

Tech Environment, having more than 40+ years of industry experience working in the field of environment and sustainability. 2. Mr Ashok Tambi - BE Chemical, M Tech Environment, having more than 18+ years of industry experience in the field of Environment, Health, Safety and Fire Protection. 3. Dr Usha Tambi - BHMS, having more than 15+ years of experience in the health sector. One of the wastes on which we are working is the Waste being generated by the liquid filtration process. Cartridge filters are used for liquid or water filtration to get the required quality of the liquid. After the useful life of Cartridge filters these are sent for disposal as solid waste to the land fill sites. We are working for recycling of these filters. Enormous amount of these filters used in the industries and generates solid waste occupying the land fill space after useful life.

Through Titlam, we upcycle textile waste into beautifully crafted items that honor traditional arts like embroidery and tie-dye, giving new life to discarded materials while supporting local artisans. In addition, we’ve developed reusable cloth pads made from bamboo charcoal fabric. These pads are antibacterial, stain-resistant, and durable for up to 160 uses, offering a sustainable alternative to single-use sanitary products and minimizing environmental impact. Together, our zero-waste products and sustainable sanitary solutions have already eliminated over 4,500 tons of sanitary plastic and 10500 Kgs of textile waste from the environment. Through Titlam, we combine sustainability with community empowerment, creating a meaningful change for both people and the planet.

description: Introducing Gooat - Revolutionizing Your Meals on the Go! Welcome to Gooat, where innovation meets health in every spoon-free bite! We take pride in introducing India's first spoon-free oats, a game-changer in the world of convenient and nutritious meals. But what exactly does "spoon-free" mean? It's simple – just add our product to milk, give it a good shake in a sipper or bottle, and voilà, your on-the-go meal is ready! Our spoon-free oats promise more than just convenience; they pack a powerful punch of nutrition with 24g of protein, 7-8g of fiber, and are 100% natural. The sweetness comes from the goodness of date powder and jaggery, ensuring a delightful and guilt-free indulgence. Why did we create this product? We had two types of people in mind: Working Professionals: For those who find themselves rushing to the office without a moment to spare for breakfast or meals. Our spoon-free oats allow them to carry a nutritious meal in a sipper, consumable anywhere – be it in a cab, metro, or rickshaw. Mid-Aged Parents: Seeking a healthy option but overwhelmed by the multitude of health products flooding the market. We understood the need for a 100% natural, delicious product that parents can easily accept. Packaged in a cute and mom-friendly design, Gooat seamlessly fits into any kitchen. With five delectable flavors - Mango Madness, Choco Nut Crunch, Mocha Marvel, Strawberry Swirl, and Chocolate Hazelnut - and two exciting upcoming ones - Blueberry and Kulfi - we ensure that our consumers never get bored. Variety is the spice of life, and we aim to keep health exciting and sustainable for the long haul. At Gooat, our goal is simple yet impactful: to balance taste, convenience, and health. We encourage individuals to make a shift towards healthier choices without compromising on the joy of indulgent flavors. Join us on this journey to a healthier and tastier lifestyle with Gooat – because you deserve the best, even on the busiest days!

When we came to know that the preservatives and hydrogenated oils filled peanut butter in the market do more harm to the body than good, our belief was shattered. Starting this venture from Kota, Rajasthan, our vision was simply to make an All-Natural peanut butter with no corruption of chemicals whatsoever, also making sure of eco-friendly packaging to be our priority, hence sticking to the reusable glass jar. Our passion to do the right thing and make changes for the better has allowed us to opt for green energy, Nature - friendly and sustainable techniques in the making of our beloved product. Inception of Building Influencers happened with the dream of enabling India’s future generation to realize their potential and reach new heights in their career. In our country, even today multiple students choose their career to fulfill unrealized dreams of their parents, rather than working on their own strengths. This leads our kids in dilemma to choose between completing parents wish or cherish their own virtues based on their innate skills. Our country is fastest growing major economy in the world, every other day new careers streams are evolving. Our education system especially in the Tier II & III cities along with rural India fails to match speed of technological advancement. By looking at above mentioned issues, we decided to come up with Building Influencers. We have changed the lives of more than 700 students and professionals. Now we aim to change lives of thousands of children in Tier II & III cities along with rural India by providing career consulting services through technology enabled platforms. Today almost all the career consulting or career counselling companies are operating in Metro’s or Tier II cities. Breaking this trend, we would like to expand our services in Tier II & III cities along with rural India. name: Greenathon Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description: Greenathon Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is a deep tech startup that works in the field of Green Technology for Pollution Control and Environmental Sustainability. Greenathon is an academic spinoff from Banasthali Vidyapith and incubated with Atal Incubation Centre, Banasthali Vidyapith that has developed solutions to control the water pollution created by the textile processing and paper recycling industry. VISION: 1. To have greener and healthier tomorrow, matching with the SDG (Sustainable Development Goals) of UNDP (United Nations Development Programme) including: ► Clean water and sanitation (Goal 6) ► Industry, innovation, and infrastructure (Goal 9) ► Sustainable cities and communities (Goal 11) ► Responsible consumption and production (Goal 12) ► Climate action (Goal 13) ► Partnerships for the goals (Goal 17) 2. To operate with a ‘Zero Waste’ goal, with clearly defined environment and sustainability policies of the organization. 3. To apply “7R Tools” (Rethink, Refuse, Reduce, Reuse, Refurbish, Recover, Recycle) to upcycle the textile industrial effluent with Zero Liquid Discharge contributing to the circular economy. MISSION: To foster green ecosystem and spearheading social contribution through science and technology. ► Greenathon developed an innovative product MICRO- BIOZYMETM and BIODEINK-SOL® by deploying microbial technologies to remediate environmental pollution created by the textile and paper recycling industry. ► With a Clean Technology Mission, Greenathon targets to facilitate business to comply with Environmental Social Governance audit points and serve the society to meet the Sustainable Development Goals. ► With three patents and three trademarks to their credit, Greenathon is committed to achieving global excellence in managing complex textile industrial effluents and repurposing used paper. ► Greenathon ensures its consistency in goods and services as per the global competence with expertise to handle complex textile industrial effluent.

If there is any other issue they cater accordingly and create a detailed sheet about the problem faced and solution provided. In next visit according to the previous session solutions we take care of the plant need. Likewise, we connect with the plants for their better health. name: Jamitson Healthcare Management Services And Solutions Pvt Ltd
description: We are building a smart tech-enabled care ecosystem of precision medicine and smart labs for hospitals, diagnostic centres, dispensaries, and research institutions — integrating AI, pharmacist-led care, and smart medical devices. Our mission is to bridge the gap between advanced urban healthcare and underserved Tier 2/3 cities by transforming traditional clinics into AI-powered precision centers. Through SmartLab retrofitting kits, we enable real-time diagnostics, connected vitals monitoring, and structured clinical data that feeds into a centralized AI platform. This allows healthcare professionals to offer personalized therapy recommendations, reducing drug misuse and improving patient safety. Each SmartLab is designed to be modular, affordable, and rapidly deployable, requiring minimal infrastructure. Our pharmacist-in-loop model ensures that treatments are guided not just by symptoms but by structured health insights, genomics, and vitals — creating a true precision care pathway. We work with stakeholders across the healthcare ecosystem: • Clinics gain plug-and-play diagnostic intelligence • Patients benefit from affordable and accurate care • Researchers access structured, anonymized real-world data • Governments and insurers can integrate predictive wellness scoring With ongoing collaborations with institutions like Dr. Morepen, MNIT, CDAC, and IIIM Jammu, and pilots across Rajasthan and Jammu, Jamitson® is scaling an ecosystem built for India’s next healthcare leap — where AI, access, and accuracy converge.

description: Vikrant AgroTech is a sole proprietorship firm. It’s mission to make healthy soil and healthy cattle. We are manufacturing Fly-ash based bio-organic manure fertilizer; cattle feed supplement and thermophillic bio-gas design. Vikrant AgroTech has developed a Bacterial Consortium which helps to break the molecule of organic manure, in the process it converts inorganic mineral metals to organic mineral metals found in Fly Ash. Cattle feed supplement is made from this manure fertilizer with help of ayurvedic chiletion therapy. Thermophillic bio-gas plant is a unique plant which is world’s first design; in this the temperature of digester is maintained between 50-60oC. The outlet slurry of this plant is fibreless and will be available in retail on Rs 300/liter (to be diluted with 300 liter water per acre to spray) will be launched as per funding get availed. Fibreless slurry means maximum dry mass gasification achieved. All the products are researched by Vikrant AgroTech and patented. One patent has been granted in November 2022. Three products are ready to launch in market with specified rate: 1) Solid fly-ash biomineral fertilizer Rs 200/kg through online platform. 2) Fly-ash biomineral rich liquid foliar Rs 500/liter. 3) Bacterial consortium Rs 300/liter to decay agriculture waste to organic fertilizer.

The app will offer a range of features to help users record and track their family tree, including details about their ancestors, siblings, and extended family members. Users can input details like name, birth and death dates, occupation, and other relevant information. Verification: The app will provide a verification feature that will allow users to verify their family tree by cross-checking their data with the data of other users who have added their family members to the app. Photo and Document Storage: Users will be able to store and attach photos and documents related to their family members in the app. This will enable them to keep track of important documents like birth certificates, marriage certificates, and other relevant information. Search and Connect: The app will allow users to search for their relatives and connect with them, even if they are not currently in their family tree. Privacy and Security: The app will ensure the privacy and security of user data by using encryption and other security measures. Users will have control over who can view their family tree and what information they want to share. Target Audience: Family Tree Tracker is targeted at individuals and families who want to maintain accurate and up-to-date information about their family history.

description: Camvia Labs is on a mission to revolutionize the way wedding memories are consumed, shared, and stored in India. Every year, over 12 million weddings take place across the country, generating an enormous amount of photo and video content. Yet, the industry still relies on outdated tools like USB sticks and manual album creation, making the process inefficient and inaccessible—especially for people in tier 2/3/4 cities. Camvia Labs is bridging this gap by building a digital-first platform that makes wedding media truly accessible, easy to share, and socially engaging for the masses. At the heart of our solution is a simple, intuitive, and mobile-first experience that allows users to view, download, and share high-resolution wedding photos anytime, anywhere—without needing a laptop or physical storage device. Whether it’s sending a wedding album to friends on WhatsApp or posting memories as Instagram Reels or stories, Camvia Labs empowers users to celebrate their special moments in the format that today’s generation prefers—fast, social, and on the go. With features like one-click album access, smart filters, auto-generated layouts, and AI-powered short-form content creation, we are reshaping how wedding content is consumed and enjoyed in the digital age. For photographers, Camvia Labs streamlines operations end-to-end. Our platform eliminates hours of manual work—from sorting photos to printing albums—through automation and intelligent tools. Photographers no longer need to spend time burning USBs or chasing clients for payments. With our swipe-to-sort interface, cloud-based sharing, and integration with high-quality printing partners, photographers can focus on what they do best: capturing memories. The result is faster service delivery, lower operational costs, and a far better client experience.

SAVE WATER - Hydro air conditioner use 30%-40% less water than air cooler and also use Air conditioner indoor unit condensed water for cooling. 3. NO NOISE - Air coolers do lots of noise inside room on the another side Hydro Air conditioner is quiet similar to conventional air conditioner, so it also improve mental health. 4. HEALTH BENEFITS - Air cooler have many holes to take outdoor air.But that holes also create way for mosquitoes, which cause dengue and malaria. But hydro Air conditioner has separate indoor & outdoor unit like split Air conditioners. 5. LOW GLOBAL WARMING - Hydro air conditioner need less refrigerant than conventional air conditioner. So global warming potential is lower than conventional air conditioner. 6. At Aagaaz Jaipur, we aren’t just creating fashion — we’re making choices that matter, for you and the world around us. description: At Tvashtr Biotech, we live by our motto: "Change is the only constant." Healthcare must evolve continuously, and we refuse to let diagnostics remain confined to outdated, lab-dependent systems. We are on a mission to build that future, where healthcare adapts to people, not the other way around. Tvashtr Biotech Private Limited is focusing on bridging the gap from eliminating laboratory dependency to developing novel, rapid, portable, easy-to-use and scalable technologies. Traditional tests in Immunodiagnostics are costly INR(8,000 - 25,000), require extensive laboratory utilisation and professional supervision, yet they have established their space in a INR 47.5K Cr industry. Post-COVID there has been a sudden shift toward home-based, rapid diagnostics has encouraged diagnosis at the user's comfort and the potential to develop diagnostic tools in a newly penetrable market segment. We are proposing a portable, handheld, Rapid Allergy Testing kit(RATK), which will detect 50+ Allergens within 40-45 minutes using 2-4 mL of blood using a self-usable blood extraction patch; the product (RATK) will be provided along with a post-test support AI for Lifestyle support. Given the high prevalence of allergies in the USA and EU, we have identified these regions as our primary target markets to maximise social impact.

description: Home ProShield is a digital platform that helps users efficiently manage and maintain their home and office appliances. It is designed to simplify the appliance lifecycle by offering a suite of smart features through a mobile and web application. Key Products & Services: ✅ Appliance Registration – Users can upload and store bills, invoices, and basic details of appliances like ACs, refrigerators, washing machines, laptops, water purifiers, etc. ✅ Warranty Tracking & Reminders – The platform tracks each appliance's warranty period and sends timely reminders for expiration, AMC renewals, and brand service schedules. ✅ One-Click Branded Service Booking – Home ProShield enables users to book brand-authorized services (installation, maintenance, breakdown, etc.) with a single click, removing the need to call customer care. ✅ Service History & Documentation – Each appliance gets a digital service log that records maintenance, repairs, and status updates, making future servicing more efficient. ✅ Access to User Manuals & DIY Videos – Users can find and download manuals, guides, and how-to videos to understand their appliances and troubleshoot minor issues. ✅ Parts & Accessories Suggestions – Through integrations with trusted marketplaces like Amazon, users can find compatible, genuine parts and accessories directly from the app. ✅ Customer Support Access – The app provides one-tap access to customer care numbers and support links for all registered brands, saving time during breakdowns. ✅ Multi-Brand, Multi-Location Support – Suitable for homes, offices, hotels, and institutions, users can manage appliances from different brands and locations in one place. Home ProShield offers convenience, reliability, and peace of mind by making appliance care effortless and organized.

name: SPLASHIERZ LINK COMMUNICATION
description: Today each and every business relies heavily on Internet for their business. Internet connects the business to the world but also exposes it to cyber attacks and network issues. Hence, it is imperative for any business to have a firewall and some sort of network management system. However, we see that only big businesses can afford to install and maintain firewalls because of the high CapEx and OpEx. All businesses do not have capacity to first buy expensive hardware and then hire workforce to configure and maintain this hardware. We solve this problem by providing businesses a subscription based firewall which is managed by our engineers remotely. Here, businesses have to invest zero on CapEx and very less on OpEx as our subscriptions are very affordable depending on the number of services opted by the customer. Our Firewall solution can replace existing Firewall Equipments like Fortinet, Sophos, Checkpoint etc. to provide customers all the services provided by these devices like: DDoS attack mitigation, Firewall (basic/advance), VPN, SD-WAN, Tunneling Services with IPSec, Bandwidth Management, WAN balancing, Load balancing etc. There is no licensing fees and no long term commitments. First we audit the customer requirement and accordingly suggest best possible service package. Doing so, we would be able to bring maximum number of businesses behind firewall protection which will be very affordable. As this firewall will be managed by our engineers, customers automatically get best Network Management with least amount of downtime, which in turn increases productivity.

However, with the increasing demand for senior AI professionals, now even senior IT executives are keen to learn AI. However, the needs of senior professionals are different from the students. Students and junior professionals need to go deep, they need to do more hands-on and master the technology while Senior professionals need to go wide. Apart from understanding the technical part of AI, they also need to know the management part, like - security concerns, regulations, how to build an AI team, the costs involved, real use cases of AI in businesses etc. The major problems with most existing AI courses are - Do not cover the latest topics like Generative AI, Large Language Models, LLM Agents etc. - Long duration: 6 months to 2 years - Do not cover management topics like - AI/ LLM Security, How to build AI teams, Regulations in AI, Real use cases of AI in businesses etc. We have designed an AI-enabled educational platform keeping the needs of senior professionals in mind. The platform has tailored AI courses for senior professionals. There will be virtual AI teachers who will teach AI courses to learners. Unlike most edtech platforms where the delivery mechanism is pre-recorded videos, our course delivery mechanism is hybrid of tailored videos and expert-led doubt clearing sessions. - Felicitated by the Chief Minister of Rajasthan for the contribution in education space - Trained 1000+ professionals from Microsoft, Infosys, Maersk, Sapient, Oracle, TCS, Genpact, Airtel, Unilever, Vodafone, Jio, etc

By integrating agriculture into the school curriculum, our aim is to cultivate a deep connection between young minds and the land they inhabit. However, our mission goes beyond food. Understanding that trees are the lifeblood of our environment, the initiative emphasizes not just tree plantation, but tree cultivation. Our offerings include: Wattle: India’s first water-positive mineral water brand, offering premium alkaline drinking water in sustainable, 100% recyclable super-flint glass bottles. Elemental Water’s process is entirely sustainable, with zero natural resource exploitation, no plastic waste, and a commitment to circularity. Backed by ISO and HACCP certifications, we ensure unparalleled quality and safety. Our business model focuses on addressing the $13 billion bottled water market and the growing demand for sustainable industrial water solutions. name: LD Agencies
description: The Growing Industry of Disposable Items: Manufacturing for Convenience and Sustainability Introduction Disposable items have become an essential part of modern life, offering convenience, hygiene, and efficiency in various industries. The manufacturing of disposable products is a booming sector that caters to food service, healthcare, hospitality, and many other domains. With the increasing demand for single-use products, businesses in this field must focus on innovation, cost-effectiveness, and sustainability to stay competitive. ### The Importance of Disposable Items in Various Industries Disposable items are widely used across different industries due to their ease of use and hygienic benefits. In the food service industry, disposable plates, cups, and cutlery have become indispensable for restaurants, cafes, and catering businesses. These products help in maintaining cleanliness and reducing the need for extensive dishwashing, saving both time and resources. In the healthcare sector, disposable syringes, gloves, masks, and gowns play a critical role in preventing cross-contamination and ensuring patient safety. These products have been vital in controlling the spread of infectious diseases, especially during global health crises like the COVID-19 pandemic.

name: JAITAM FINTECH LLP
description: MINATO is a fintech platform that facilitates B2B transactions safe & reliable in India. We are solving most common problem – trust gap between buyers and sellers. The most common problem in India’s business scenarios is delayed payments, frauds, and disputes which create significant inefficiencies. Thus we are here to stop fraud, make deals happen in a smooth and secure manner and let businesses trust each other. MINATO is designed to eliminate trust barriers in B2B transactions by leveraging a secure, escrow-based payment system. By integrating bank managed escrow accounts, MINATO provides a transparent, compliant, and legally structured solution that aligns with RBI guidelines. A buyer will transfer the fund to MINATO’s escrow account and the fund is held securely until predefined transaction conditions (such as product delivery or service completion, date of delivery etc) are met. Once the seller ships the products and the product is delivered, instant settlement is done to sellers account. All our merchants (buyers and sellers) on our platform are genuine and KYC verified. To combat frauds, MINATO will use blockchain technology like Hyperledger for secure records and smart deals, making us India’s first with the lowest fees. In our next phase, we’ll launch India’s first trading system with special QR codes that change based on location, using geo-tagging, benefitting millions of traders thus saving billions. MINATO’s vision is to become the trusted financial backbone for B2B commerce, driving secure and seamless digital transactions across industries.

name: BEST COLLEGE ADVICE
description: I want to start a Career Counseling & Skill development company that works only for tier 4 cities and rural areas. It will also help in rural development, which is our real Bharat. We will help rural students to get the best career options after 12th as per their profile and future goals. Because there is a huge gap in this area. As most of the companies are not going to rural areas physically and very few people are going to rural areas, i.e. only for one day seminar in schools, but what after that? Nobody is thinking about it. We will open a small shop-type office in that village so that students and their parents can easily contact us. Also, the owner of that office will be a local of the same area. He will get proper career counseling training so that he has first-hand experience. This will give him a business opportunity and it will help in generating employment in the rural sector. Apart from this, we will also include things like offline skills and training sessions in rural areas. We will work together with top edtech companies and universities so that students can get the best career options at one place. Also the companies will get students from us. So it will help create an ecosystem for both of us. The Problems:- * Lack of Consistent Career Guidance in Rural India: Most career seminars in villages are one-day events with no follow-up support. * Limited Access to Information: Rural students and their parents are unaware of modern career paths and scholarship opportunities. * Unemployment and Underemployment: Many rural youths choose the wrong career paths due to lack of guidance. Our Solution:- * Local Career Guidance Hubs: Physical offices operated by trained locals in their villages. * Ongoing Support: Year-round counseling, college guidance, scholarships, EdTech onboarding. * Parent Engagement: Workshops and interactive sessions with families. * EdTech & University Partnerships: One-stop access to college options, test prep, and all.

name: OOBLECK KA SPEEDBRAKER
description: An Oobleck speed breaker is a type of speed bump that utilizes a non-Newtonian fluid, like Oobleck (a mixture of cornstarch and water), which changes its consistency depending on the force applied to it. When a vehicle travels at a high speed over the Oobleck, it behaves like a solid, slowing the vehicle down. However, when a vehicle travels at a lower speed, it acts like a liquid, providing a smoother and more comfortable ride. Advantages: Reduced Damage: Oobleck speed breakers are designed to minimize damage to vehicles, especially when they are traveling at lower speeds, says an article in IRJET. Comfort: They provide a smoother ride for vehicles traveling at appropriate speeds, unlike traditional speed bumps that can be jarring. Cost-Effective: The cost of manufacturing and installing Oobleck speed breakers is generally lower than traditional concrete or asphalt speed bumps,

name: WE PURE
description: We Pure – शुद्ध और सेहत का वादा In today’s world, water stands as the most essential human need. A person can survive for days without food, but not without water. In India, the mineral water bottle market is currently valued at USD 9.5 billion and is growing at an impressive annual rate of 12.5%. At this pace, the market is projected to reach USD 29.7 billion by 2030. Currently, only 30% of this market is organized, while the remaining 70% remains unorganized. This significant market gap presents a powerful opportunity — and this is where my startup, "We Pure", comes in. Just like popular brands such as Amul and Havmor sell their ice creams through mobile ice cream carts, "We Pure" will distribute clean, affordable mineral water through specially designed water carts. Our offering: 1-liter mineral water bottles priced at just ₹15, ensuring both affordability and quality for the masses. Our initial focus will be on high-footfall areas such as bus depots and railway stations, where more than 50 million people travel daily by bus and over 1.2 million people use trains every day. This is a high-potential niche market with tremendous demand, yet a lack of organized and accessible supply. I strongly believe that "We Pure"has the potential to become a revolutionary solution in the mineral water segment and achieve rapid growth in the coming years. I invite you to join us in bringing this vision to life. "At present, Indian Railways generates an annual revenue of approximately ₹350 crore solely from the sale of packaged drinking water under its Rail Neer brand. In a similar domain, my startup is developing a wide-reaching distribution network that aims to ensure the availability of bottled water at most bus terminals across India — particularly in Tier-1, Tier-2, and Tier-3 cities. Through this expansion, it is estimated that around 3,000 jobs will be created, which will not only generate new local employment opportunities.

name: XODGAMES STUDIO PRIVATE LIMITED
description: XOD Games is an innovative game development studio based in Jaipur, Rajasthan, founded by brothers Yash and Shashank Singh. Established with a passion for crafting immersive, narrative-driven experiences, the studio aims to build an ecosystem of quality video games that empower players with meaningful storytelling, setting it apart from the prevalent addictive gaming trends in India. We have achieved remarkable milestones, including winning the Rajasthan Game Jam held by iStart Rajasthan and earning recognition from Col. Rajyavardhan Singh Rathore, Minister of IT & Communication. With this foundation, we are poised to revolutionize India’s gaming landscape, one compelling story at a time.

name: Barfi Institute
description: At BeBarfi, we are working to build an enterprise that holistically addresses key challenges associated with India’s street snack and beverage sector — including juice shops, tea and coffee houses, quick-service snack centers, and food vending carts (thelas). The challenges we seek to solve include: 1. Quality and Nutrition: Most street food lacks basic nutritional value and often uses heavily processed ingredients. 2. Waste and Environmental Impact: A large volume of single-use, plastic-coated disposables leads to serious issues — harming animals, reducing soil health, and contributing to larger environmental and public health challenges. 3. Vendor Livelihoods: Many street vendors are untrained, underpaid (in relative terms), overworked, and often lack access to better products or professional growth opportunities. Our Approach: We are creating mini-cafes and nutritious carts designed to serve "choti bhukh" snacks and drinks that meet four essential standards: i. Tastes Amazing — Every product is crafted to be truly enjoyable. ii. Good for You — Made without refined or processed ingredients; rooted in natural nutrition. iii. Feels Familiar — Recipes built around traditional, comforting flavors. iv. Affordable — Fairly priced to stay accessible to everyone. Beyond Food: Our model also addresses broader social and environmental challenges by: - Introducing hyperlocal composting solutions to manage organic waste. - Using technology innovations to eliminate single-use disposable practices. - Offer a pre-incubation space which ignites entrepreneurship curiosity amongst youth. Our First Step: We have opened a mini-breakfast café — BeBarfi Startup Café — https://g.co/kgs/ogVvGB3 Located in Jaipur, the café operates between 6:30 AM and 11:00 AM.

name: Aynsh Impex
description: Marbleous: Exclusive Marble decor items Marbleous promotes the formation of beautiful marble handicrafts. There is a belief in transforming the finest marble into elegant pieces. Perfection in our passion and work dedicated to quality is shown in our work.

name: JEEVANTIKA INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
description: Jeevantika Innovations Private Limited is India's first dedicated SaaS platform focused on solving the complex challenge of lost and unclaimed investment recovery. In India, an estimated ₹1.8 lakh crore worth of shares and dividends remain unclaimed, impacting over 2 crore investors and their legal heirs. The recovery process today remains largely manual, fragmented, and inefficient, leading to delays, financial losses, and wealth erosion across generations. Jeevantika Innovations transforms this landscape by offering a structured, technology-driven solution. Our platform automates end-to-end workflows, organizes documentation digitally, ensures real-time tracking, and complies with SEBI and IEPF regulatory frameworks. Financial intermediaries such as advisors, consultants, and legal professionals use our SaaS platform to efficiently manage and resolve shareholder cases, enhancing transparency, accuracy, and client service. Key differentiators include: End-to-End Workflow Automation for case initiation to claim settlement. Smart Document Management reducing errors and manual effort. Scalable Architecture built to manage thousands of shareholders simultaneously. Free Searchable Database for ₹40,000 crore worth of shareholder data transferred to the IEPF Authority. We operate on a B2B SaaS subscription model, earning revenue through monthly, quarterly, and annual subscriptions, along with optional paid training programs like CUSRA (Certified Unclaimed Shares Recovery Advisor) to strengthen the advisor ecosystem. Our vision is to empower millions of investors and their heirs to reclaim their rightful wealth effortlessly, and to create India's leading digital ecosystem for lost investment recovery. Jeevantika Innovations combines technology, regulatory expertise, and deep domain specialization to solve a national problem with great scalable potential.

name: Pitstop Stories
description: Pitstop Stories is a Jaipur-based creative agency offering comprehensive visual and digital communication solutions. We specialize in high-quality video production including corporate films, advertisements, music videos, documentaries, event coverage, and animated content. Our services also include professional photography, logo and brand identity design, helping organizations communicate effectively across digital platforms. We have worked with government bodies, NGOs, and private firms on impactful projects. Notable work includes a tourism film for Pratapgarh, Rajasthan; a documentary on the "Mehnagi Rahat Camp"; coverage of the Rajiv Gandhi Rural and Urban Olympic Games 2023; and Mission Drishti, a healthcare initiative launched by the Collector of Pratapgarh. We led the social media documentation and coverage for the Anthem Campaign of the 37th National Games in Goa. Additionally, we produced a six-month documentary on Kota’s transformation into India’s first city without traffic lights—featuring key sites like the Chambal Riverfront and Eco Park, in collaboration with Studio Jones. These projects reflect our ability to merge creativity with purpose and deliver content that informs, inspires, and engages.

name: PEACE AND POSE YOGA STUDIO
description: Peace and Pose Yoga Studio promotes holistic wellness through yoga, meditation, and mindfulness. We offer inclusive classes for all age groups, including rural outreach and therapy sessions. With eco-friendly practices and local employment, we blend tradition with innovation. Our goal is to expand access to yoga, train youth, and improve community health across Rajasthan through mobile and digital programs.

name: NURTUREMUMY
description: Nurturemumy.com is a purpose driven startup dedicated to mother healthcare from pregnancy, childbirth as long as she's alive. It offers products, services, and community based support to ensure mothers recieve comprehensive care- physically, mentally aand nutritionally from her first motherhood till she alive, as there is no company providing complete solutions to mother healthcare it will be a great initiative for nurturing the nurturer. our products include: 1) Medri:A patented device that solves a major problrm of 70% Indian mothers forgot to take medicine timely that adversely effect there health, medri is a a IOT based device that remind mothers by giving them timely notification on phone and reminder in human voice, till mother take medicines as prescribed by doctors 2)nursing and breastfeeding essentials 3) Postnatal recovery kits 4)online consultation with gynecologist 5) personalized yoga and nutritional classes for mothers of every age group 6) mental health counseling for every age group mothersand many more. Technology support: 1)IOT based hardware device 2)community forum for mothers 3)natural ayurvedic based solution for mother's healthcare. Target Customer: 1) Expecting mothers 2) new mothers 3)Families seeking reliable, modern, and ayurvedic rooted maternal care 4) mothers of every age group

name: Mewar Generics
description: GenericPOINT – Empowering Pharmacies, Enriching Lives The Problem In many parts of India, especially in villages and small towns, people struggle to get good-quality and affordable medicines. Small, honest medical shops often earn very little and find it hard to compete with big medical chains. This means customers have fewer choices and higher prices. Our Solution GenericPOINT supports these trusted local medical shops and helps them grow. We offer a wide range of high-quality, low-cost generic medicines under the GenericPOINT brand. This helps shop owners serve their customers better and earn more. Key Highlights Partnership Model: We work with existing medical shops and bring them under the GenericPOINT name. This creates a network of reliable and trusted stores. For Customers: People get safe, effective, and affordable generic medicines with full trust and clarity. For Shop Owners: They see more customers, better profits, exclusive products, and get support from our team—branding, stock, training, and technology. Reaching Rural Areas: GenericPOINT focuses on reaching even the most remote villages, bringing quality healthcare closer to home. What Makes Us Different While others build new shops, GenericPOINT strengthens those that already serve the community with honesty. We give them better products, tools, training, and a strong brand—so they can grow and help more people. Our Vision To build India’s most trusted network for generic medicines—making quality and affordable healthcare available to every family, everywhere

name: Hunar Ghar
description: Our startup is dedicated to empowering women through the art of fashion, with a unique blend of traditional Rajasthani craftsmanship and modern design. We specialize in stitching, royal attire, and contemporary dresses that incorporate a rich cultural touch, celebrating the heritage of Rajasthan. Our mission is to inspire creativity, confidence, and self-sufficiency among women by providing them with the skills and opportunities to thrive in the fashion industry. Additionally, we conduct workshops aimed at promoting the welfare of college students, fostering personal and professional growth within the community.

name: MinvoxAI
description: Founded in 2025, MinvoxAI Pvt. Ltd., a forward- thinking company at the forefront of innovation in the fields of Robotics and Artificial Intelligence. At MinvoxAI, we believe that the future of technology lies in creating intelligent, adaptive systems that not only perform tasks but also learn, evolve, and collaborate with humans in meaningful ways. Our team is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what’s possible, creating robotic solutions that enhance productivity, improve efficiency, and transform industries. From intelligent automation to cutting-edge AI-driven products, MinvoxAI is building the foundation for a smarter, more connected world.

name: BM COMPANIES
description: BizAutoConnect is a flagship initiative by BM Companies, a Jaipur-based startup focused on harnessing the power of Artificial Intelligence to create smart, data-driven solutions. Designed to automate WhatsApp chats, BizAutoConnect empowers businesses to streamline customer communication, provide real-time support, and enhance user engagement with minimal manual intervention. As part of its broader vision, BM Companies is committed to developing intelligent platforms that drive operational efficiency and elevate digital interactions. With a strong emphasis on innovation and accessibility, the company aims to become a key player in the evolving AI ecosystem of Rajasthan
